common.name: TOPHAT
common.description: A wrapper script to run TOPHAT (which uses Bowtie) to do fast short read alignment against a reference sequence
common.notes: Uses Tophat v 0.1.12 and Bowtie v 0.12.2

common.name: eland2ace.pl
common.description: Convert Eland output sorted.txt file into an .ace file

common.name: image2eland.pl
common.description: Process images into base calls with Bustard and align reads against reference sequence with Eland

common.name: MAQ
common.description: Align to reference and predict SNPs.

common.name: SAV
common.notes: Call SNPs in pileup format from .SAM or .BAM file generated for each chromosome of the target species (DEFAULT: human hg19). Annotates using user-specified dbSNP (DEFAULT: dbsnp130)

common.name: filterSNP
common.description: Filter SNPs by quality, coverage, etc.

common.name: FTP
common.description: Download FTP files or web pages from a URL
common.notes: Download all files found in links in a page or raw text file

common.name: replaceString.pl
common.description: Convert .ace file into multiple ace files

common.name: splitace.pl
common.description: Convert a single .ace file into multiple ace files, one for each contig.

common.name: jbrowseFeatures
common.description: Generate JBrowse features for all chromosomes in parallel

admin.name: coverage
admin.description: A UCSC BedGraph wigglegram track, showing the depth of coverage at each position, including the spliced read alignments.

admin.name: cpus
admin.description: Max. number of cpus per job (1 to 4) (DEFAULT = 4)

admin.name: distance
admin.description: The mean inner distance between first read and its mate pair (corresponds to -r/--mate-inner-dist argument to Tophat)

admin.name: hits
admin.description: A list of read alignments in SAM format. SAM is a compact short read alignment format that is increasingly being adopted.

admin.name: inputfiles
admin.description: Comma-separated *sequence.txt file names (e.g., s_1_1_sequence.txt,s_2_1_sequence.txt)

admin.name: jobs
admin.description: Max. number of concurrent cluster jobs (DEFAULT = 30)

admin.name: junctions
admin.description: A UCSC BED track of junctions reported by TopHat. Each junction consists of two connected BED blocks, where each block is as long as the maximal overhang of any read spanning the junction. The score is the number of alignments spanning the junction.

admin.name: keep
admin.description: Keep intermediate files

admin.name: label
admin.description: Name to used to submit jobs to cluster (e.g., tophat-sample1)

admin.name: matefiles
admin.description: Comma-separated *sequence.txt mate file names (e.g., s_1_2_sequence.txt,s_2_2_sequence.txt) with locations as paths relative to the output directory

admin.name: filter
admin.description: Download only files containing this text fragment

admin.name: outputdir
admin.description: Create this directory and download files to it

admin.name: regex
admin.description: Download files matching this regular expression

admin.name: url
admin.description: Download files linked on this page

admin.name: clean
admin.description: Clean run (remove old splitfile)

admin.name: consensus
admin.description: Consensus sequence and qualities in FASTQ format

admin.name: convert
admin.description: Convert from Solexa FASTQ to Sanger FASTQ

admin.name: dupfile
admin.description: Same as out.map file but with duplicate reads aligned against the reference with identical outer coordinates removed

admin.name: hzsnps-filter
admin.description: Filtered predicted homozygous indels

admin.name: indelsoa
admin.description: Predicted homozygous indels

admin.name: inputfile
admin.description: Single read or first paired-end sequence file

admin.name: jobs
admin.description: Maximum number of concurrently queued or running jobs on the cluster queue for this run (Default: 30)

admin.name: mapfile
admin.description: Binary mapping file containing alignment of all reads against reference

admin.name: matefile
admin.description: Second paired-end sequence file

admin.name: outputdir
admin.description: Output alignment and SNP files will be printed to this directory

admin.name: PE-indels
admin.description: Indel calls, only produced with paired-end reads

admin.name: queue
admin.description: Submit to a particular queue or add other submission options

admin.name: reads
admin.description: Number of reads per batch input file (Default = 1 million)

admin.name: referencedir
admin.description: Directory containing MAQ format binary fasta (.bfa) files for all human chromosomes

admin.name: snp
admin.description: List of raw SNPs extracted from comparison of consensus and reference files

admin.name: snp-filter
admin.description: Filtered SNP predictions based on indelsoa, indelpe and cns.snp files

admin.description: File containing list of batch input sequence file locations
